alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Catawba; Cleveland; Davie; Eastern McDowell; Eastern Polk; Gaston; Greater Burke; Greater Caldwell; Greater Rutherford; Iredell; Lincoln; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 08 at 3:37AM EST until February 08 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. Patchy freezing fog. * WHERE...The northwest Piedmont and foothills of North Carolina, including Alexander, Iredell, Catawba, Cleveland, Lincoln, Gaston, Greater Caldwell, Greater Burke, Eastern McDowell and Greater Rutherford Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and some slippery spots on bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are hovering just above freezing across the Advisory area, but there are some locations where the temperature was below freezing. Where the temperature falls below freezing, the fog droplets may freeze on elevated surfaces, resulting in an additional danger for slippery patches on bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Alexander; Catawba; Cleveland; Davie; Eastern McDowell; Eastern Polk; Gaston; Greater Burke; Greater Caldwell; Greater Rutherford; Iredell; Lincoln; Rowan
